Definition: In this task, you will be given a text. You need to output "Yes" if the text is about a person, and "No" if the text is not about a person. The text is about a person if it is generally about a person. Mentions of people in the text don't necessarily mean the text is about a person.

Positive Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Positive Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, the answer is No.

Positive Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Positive Examples.explanation: Alison Bechdel is an American cartoonist. Clearly the text is about a person. The answer should be Yes.

Negative Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Negative Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Negative Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Negative Examples.explanation: The output is neither "Yes" nor "No". Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Instances.input: Text:  China Medical University (CMU; Chinese: 中國醫藥大學; pinyin: Zhōngguó Yīyào Dàxué) is a private university in Taichung Taiwan. The university enrolls approximately 8000 students.Although its English name is the same as a university in Shenyang Mainland China the Chinese name of the mainland university is different: 中國醫科大學.

Text:  Erling Lars Dale (12 March 1947 – 25 September 2011) was a Norwegian educationalist.He took his doctor's degree in 1987 and was an associate professor at the University of Oslo. He was hired as professor in 1993.
Text:  John Miller Andrews CH PC (17 July 1871 – 5 August 1956) was the second Prime Minister of Northern Ireland.
Text:  Vasili Aleksandrovich Kuznetsov (Russian: Василий Александрович Кузнецов; born 24 August 1978) is a Russian professional footballer. Currently he plays for FC Istra.

Text:  Helissio (1993 - 2013) was a Thoroughbred racehorse sired by Fairy King and a grandson of Northern Dancer. Owned by the Spanish businessman Enrique Sarasola he was voted the European Horse of the Year for 1996His career highlight was winning the 1996 running of the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe at Longchamps by five lengths and earned a Timeform rating of 136.

Text:  Yang Yanqin (simplified Chinese: 杨彦芹; traditional Chinese: 楊彥芹; pinyin: Yáng Yànqín; born August 28 1966) is a former female shot put athlete from China. She competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles California finishing in tenth place (16.97 metres) in the overall-rankings. She was the youngest member (17 years 341 days) at those Games of the Chinese track and field delegation.

Text:  Alicia Leeke is an American painter and artist working and residing in Columbia South Carolina. She is best known for her post-impressionistic style and incorporation of Fauvism. Her artwork is distinctive for its dry brush painting technique gentle distortion of linear perspective and use of thick line and brush strokes.

Text:  Salem First United Methodist Church is a Methodist congregation and historic church in Salem Oregon United States. The church was listed on the National Register of Historic Places under its original name First Methodist Episcopal Church of Salem in 1983. First United is the oldest Methodist church west of the Rocky Mountains and is a designated United Methodist Heritage Landmark.
